MinorImprovement.Name: Axe
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you add a room to your Wooden hut, you only pay 2 Wood and 2 Reed.

MinorImprovement.Name: Canoe
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you use the "Fishing" Action space, you receive an additional 1 Food and 1 Reed.

MinorImprovement.Name: Market Stall
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, you receive 1 Vegetable.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Field
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, immediately Plow 1 field.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Stable
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, immediately build 1 stable.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Building
Material
MinorImprovement.Text:
You receive either 1 Wood or 1 Clay when you play this card.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Helpful
Neighbors
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, you receive either 1 Stone or 1 Reed.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Spindle
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you have 3/5 Sheep during the Field phase of a Harvest, you receive 1/2 additional Food.

MinorImprovement.Name: Dovecote
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Food each on the spaces for rounds 10 to 14. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Food.

MinorImprovement.Name: Windmill
MinorImprovement.Text: At any time, you can convert Grain to 2 Food (without having to Bake bread).

MinorImprovement.Name: Reed Pond
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Reed each on the next 3 Round spaces. At the start of each round, you receive the Reed.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Writing
Desk
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you use an "Occupation" Action, you may play 2 Occupations one after another. The second Occupation costs you 2 Food.

MinorImprovement.Name: Butter Churn
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you have Sheep during the Field phase of a Harvest, you receive 1 Food for each third Sheep. Whenever you have Cattle during the Field phase, you receive 1 Food for each second Cattle.

MinorImprovement.Name: Fishing Rod
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you use the "Fishing" Action space, you receive 1 additional Food. From Round 8, you receive 2 additional Food.

MinorImprovement.Name: Outhouse
MinorImprovement.Text: The Outhouse has no effect. You can only build it if at least one other player has fewer than 2 Occupations.

MinorImprovement.Name: Quarry
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you use the "Day Laborer" Action, you receive an additional 3 Stone.

MinorImprovement.Name: Animal Pen
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 2 Food on each remaining Round space. At the start of each round, you receive the Food.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Simple
Fireplace
MinorImprovement.Text:
At any time, cook Food:
Vegetables
Sheep
Wild boar
Cattle
Whenever you "Bake Bread" you may convert:
Grain

MinorImprovement.Name: Fruit Tree
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Food on each remaining Round space for rounds 8 to 14. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Food.

MinorImprovement.Name: Corn Scoop
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you use the "Take 1 Grain" Action space, you receive 1 additional Grain.

MinorImprovement.Name: Sack Cart
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Grain each on the spaces for rounds 5, 8, 11, and 14. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Grain.

MinorImprovement.Name: Clogs
MinorImprovement.Text: At the end of the game, you receive 1 Bonus point for a Clay hut or 2 Bonus points for a Stone house.

MinorImprovement.Name: Manger
MinorImprovement.Text: At the end of the game, if your pastures occupy 6/7/8/9+ farmyard spaces, you receive 1/2/3/4 Bonus points.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Wood-fired
Oven
MinorImprovement.Text:
Whenever you use the "Bake bread" action, you can use the Wood-fired Oven to turn any number of Grain into 3 Food each. When you play this card, you can also take the "Bake bread" action.
Grain

MinorImprovement.Name: Private Forest
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Wood on each remaining even-numbered Round space. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Wood.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Stone House
Extension
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, immediately extend your Stone house by 1 room. (The room does not cost anything, but you must pay the cost shown to play this card.)
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Stone Tongs
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you use one of the "Stone" Action spaces that become available in Stage 2 and Stage 4, you receive 1 additional Stone.

MinorImprovement.Name: Carp Pond
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Food on each remaining odd-numbered Round space. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Food.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Cattle
Market
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, return 1 Sheep to the supply and take 1 Cattle.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Millstone
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you Bake 1 or more Grain into bread, you receive 2 additional Food.

MinorImprovement.Name: Spices
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you convert Vegetables to Food using a Fireplace, Cooking Hearth or Cooking Corner, you receive 1 additional Food.

MinorImprovement.Name: Raft
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you use the "Fishing" Action space, you receive an additional 1 Food or 1 Reed.

MinorImprovement.Name: Basket
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you use a person's action to take Wood from an Action space, you can leave 2 of the Wood on the Action space and receive 3 Food in exchange.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Turnwrest
Plow
MinorImprovement.Text: Once during the game, when you use either the "Plow 1 field" or "Plow 1 field and/or Sow" action, you can Plow 3 field instead of 1.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Riding
Plow
MinorImprovement.Text: Twice during the game, when you use either the "Plow 1 field" or "Plow 1 field and/or Sow" action, you can Plow 3 fields instead of 1.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Mini
Pasture
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, immediately Fence on space in your farmyard. You do not need to pay Wood for the fences.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Goose Pond
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Food each on the next 4 remaining Round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Food.

MinorImprovement.Name: Wood Cart
MinorImprovement.Text: Whenever you use a person to take Wood that is on an Action space, you receive 2 additional Wood.

MinorImprovement.Name: Hand Mill
MinorImprovement.Text: During the Feeding phase of the Harvest, you can use the Hand Mill to turn either 1 Grain into 2 Food or 2 Grain into 4 Food.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Schnaps
Distillery
MinorImprovement.Text: During the Feeding phase of the Harvest, you can use the Schnaps Distillery to convert at most 1 Vegetable into 4 Food. At the end of the game, you receive 1 Bonus point each for your 5th and 6th Vegetables.

MinorImprovement.Name: Chicken Coop
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Food each on the next 8 remaining Round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Food.

MinorImprovement.Name: Lumber
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, you receive 3 wood.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Boar Breeding
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, take 1 Wild boar.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Stone Cart
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Stone on each remaining even-numbered Round space. At the start of each round, you receive the Stone.

MinorImprovement.Name: Duck Pond
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Food on each of the next 3 Round spaces. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Food.

MinorImprovement.Name: Granary
MinorImprovement.Text: Place 1 Grain each on the spaces for rounds 8, 10, and 12. At the start of these rounds, you receive the Grain.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Wooden Hut
Extension
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, immediately extend your Wooden hut by 1 room.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Reed Exchange
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, you receive 2 Reed.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Corn Sheaf
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, take 1 Grain.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name: Clay Hut Extension
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, immediately extend your Clay hut by 1 room.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Stone
Exchange
MinorImprovement.Text:
When you play this card, take 2 Stone.
After you play this card, pass it to the player on your left, who adds it to his/her hand.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Moldboard
Plow
MinorImprovement.Text: Once during the game, when you use the "Plow 1 field" action, you may Plow 2 fields instead of 1. This does not apply to the "Plow 1 field and/or Sow" action.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Swing
Plow
MinorImprovement.Text: Twice during the game, when you use the "Plow 1 field" action, you can Plow 3 fields instead of 1. The Swing Plow cannot be used with the "Plow 1 field and/or Sow" action.

MinorImprovement.Name:
Crooked
Plow
MinorImprovement.Text: Once during the game, when you use the "Plow 1 field" action, you can Plow 3 fields instead of 1. This does not apply to the "Plow 1 field and/or Sow" action.
